Title: NISO insists on grid digitisation, ECOWAS synchronisation
Summary: NISO insists on grid digitisation, ECOWAS synchronisation . The Nigerian Independent System Operator has reaffirmed its commitment to digitising the national electricity grid . This comes as Nigeria remains one of the most populous countries in Africa .

Title: 10 varsities benefit from €38m French funding for ICT development
Summary: A €38 million credit facility from the French Government to support the modernisation of Nigeria’s public universities has been launched in Abuja . The facility, secured by the National Universities Commission (NUC), seeks to enhance ICT development .

Title: Senator hails DSS for decimation of criminal networks in Kogi West
Summary: Senator hails DSS for decimation of criminal networks in Kogi West . Sunday Karimi praised the Department of State Services (DSS) for partnering with the Joint Task Force and vigilantes to rid his Senatorial district of kidnappers and criminal elements .

Title: Oyebanji woos investors at Ekiti business town hall meeting
Summary: Ekiti State Governor, Mr Biodun Oyebanji, has urged investors and business owners to take advantage of the state’s friendly business environment to invest . The governor stated this when the Presidential Enabling Business Environment Council met .

Title: AGF Fagbemi urges judges, lawyers to reform justice system
Summary: Prince Lateef Fagbemi urges judges, lawyers to reform justice system . He pleaded that as ministers in the country, they should strive to make a positive impact on the nation’s justice system.

Title: 4 drown in Gombe flash flood
Summary: 4 drown in Gombe flash flood . Parents, guardians and school administrators strongly advised to keep close watch over their children and students . "Monitor children at all times"

Title: Lagos Assembly rejects delay to LG law
Summary: Lagos Assembly rejects delay to LG law . Obasa said the House had summoned Oyenuga, Attorney-General, Lawal Pedro, and Local Government Commissioner, Bolaji Robert .

Title: Aivora Trade Review 2025: Is It Safe Or Scam?
Summary: With the advent of automated trading platforms, more and more people are entering the crypto space, simplifying the process and enabling informed decisions . One such trading platform that is currently trending in the market is Aivora Trade .

Title: Tinubu promises continued funding of life-impacting projects in FCT
Summary: President Bola Tinubu pledged his support to the Minister of the Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Nyesom Wike . He made the pledge in Abuja on Tuesday, while inaugurating the newly constructed Collector Road CN-8 (Asuquo Okon Street) and other connected roads .

Title: Over 14 million people could die from US foreign aid cuts – Study
Summary: USAID provided over 40 percent of global humanitarian funding until Donald Trump returned to the White House in January . The USAID had provided over . 40 per cent of global . humanitarian funding was provided by the USAID .
